sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import useFetch from './../hooks/useFetch' import { BASE_URL} from './../utils/config' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const rewiewMsgRef = useRef('') const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null) // featch data from database const {data:tour, loading, error} = useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}`) const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) // format const options = {day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' } // submit const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() const reviewText = rewiewMsgRef.current.value; }; useEffect(() =>{ window.scrollTo(0, 0) },[]) return <>
{ loading &&

Loading...

} { loading &&

Loading...

} {!loading && !error &&

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} {price} {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Описание

{desc}

{/* tour reviews section start */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(review =>(
Anastasia Niu

{new Date('10-30-2023').toLocaleDateString( 'en-US', options )}

5
Круто!
)) }
{/* tour reviews section end */}
}
} export default TourDetails
